backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister handling user profiles, access control, and detailed match record types for multiple game modes.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old/new match record formats and mapping old match history to the new structure.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend components, pages, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme variables defining light and dark mode color tokens and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML bootstrap page loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React app entry with TanStack Router routes, global layout, theming, and AuthGate integration.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaRackScori: Form component for entering APA rack stats, validating totals, and submitting rack results.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaResultsSu: Displays final APA match results including winner, match points, player stats, and PPI.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Gates app content behind Internet Identity login, showing a loading or login screen when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button that handles login/logout via Internet Identity and clears cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Prompts new authenticated users to enter and save a profile name before using the app.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header, footer, routing outlet, login button, and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/matches/DeleteMa: Shows a confirmation dialog and deletes a match, then redirects or triggers a callback.
frontend/src/components/matches/EndMatch: Dialog to confirm ending and saving a match session, handling async save state.
frontend/src/components/matches/MatchSum: Card summarizing a match with mode, date, players, and key stats; navigates to match details.
frontend/src/components/navigation/ModeC: Generic card for selecting a game mode, showing an icon and navigating to start a new game.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout functions, and identity loading via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query wrappers for fetching and mutating user profiles and match data using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme CSS variables and base styling.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaEqualizer.ts: Defines APA skill levels and provides helpers to get points-to-win and format skill-related values.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaMatchPoints.ts: Contains APA 9-ball match point conversion tables mapping loser points to final match outcomes.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaScoring.ts: Implements APA rack scoring logic, PPI calculation, validation, and player stat aggregation.
frontend/src/lib/matches/matchBuilders.t: Builds APA 9-ball match records for practice mode, computing stats and generating match metadata.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/accepting-gifts/Accep: Manages an active Accepting Gifts session, updating score and attempts, showing rules, and saving the match when finished.
Displays the Accepting Gifts drill rules, including objectives, gameplay, and scoring guidance.
Start form for Accepting Gifts sessions where users enter player info and notes before initializing game state.
Controls APA 9-ball practice gameplay, tracks rack data, updates totals, checks for match completion, and saves results.
frontend/src/pages/apa/PracticeStartPage: Start page for APA practice where users enter players, skill levels, and notes before creating initial match state.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchDetailsP: Loads and displays detailed match information with mode-specific sections and options to navigate back or delete the match.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchHistoryP: Displays match history with filtering by mode and navigates to home or starting a new game.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing app title and navigation cards for different practice modes plus a button to view match history.
frontend/src/pages/straight-shot/Straigh: Manages the active Straight Shot drill session, updating strokes and saving the match when finished.
Shows the rules and gameplay guidelines for the Straight Shot drill.
Initializes a new Straight Shot drill session and shows recent moving-average stats.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Stores overall project state including app summary, architectural notes, known issues, and a list of existing features with IDs and versions. Serves as the central specification and tracking document for the pool scorekeeper appâ€™s modes, rules, and requirements.
